title: Reach POC on Cardano
description: New devs face 3 problems: developer lockout, component consistency, and high cost of correctness when choosing to develop on blockchain
solution: POC will show how Reach Lang & Compiler expand inclusion, ease the learning curve to create secure DApps & Cardano's reach to new devs
experience: The Reach team has successfully integrated 3 different blockchains (Ethereum, Algorand, and Conflux)
